room_title: Escape room "Western Bank Heist" by Escape the Room STL in St. Louis
review: So my fianc√© and I are visiting from NC, and we took my little sister to her first escape room! What a positive experience! Great puzzles, well-designed room!

room_title: Escape room "Western Bank Heist" by Escape the Room STL in St. Louis
review: We had a great time! I went with my daughter and her cousin. They are 10 years old. Jacob was our facilitator and he did a wonderful job explaining our mission!

room_title: Escape room "Western Bank Heist" by Escape the Room STL in St. Louis
review: Really exceeded my expectations!! It was challenging, but not too hard and we had a great time! I recommend buying the whole group of tickets though, if you don't wanna work with strangers! Can't wait to go back!
